author: Yanir Seroussi
title: Don't build AI, build with AI
description: Building AI is hard and expensive. For most companies, the path to AI success is building with third-party AI interns and cheap AI cogs.
content:
Drew Breunig divides AI uses cases into Gods, Interns, and Cogs:
